articles.title: Wagner group signals it will stay in Bakhmut after Prigozhin threatened to pull forces - Reuters
articles.description: Russia's Wagner mercenary group appeared on Sunday to ditch plans to withdraw from Bakhmut in eastern Ukraine, saying they had been promised more a…
articles.content: KYIV, May 7 (Reuters) - Russia's Wagner mercenary group appeared on Sunday to ditch plans to withdraw from Bakhmut in eastern Ukraine, saying they had been promised more arms by Moscow and suggesting… [+4791 chars]
